mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm_settings ( equipmentCode, sensorType, minThreshold, maxThreshold, description, enabled ) VALUES ( #{equipmentCode}, #{sensorType}, #{minThreshold}, #{maxThreshold}, #{description}, #{enabled} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, equipmentCode, sensorType, minThreshold, maxThreshold, description, enabled FROM alarm_settings WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, equipmentCode, sensorType, minThreshold, maxThreshold, description, enabled FROM alarm_settings WHERE equipmentCode = #{equipmentCode} AND sensorType = #{sensorType}

SELECT id, equipment_code as equipmentCode, sensor_type as sensorType, min_threshold as minThreshold, max_threshold as maxThreshold, description, enabled FROM alarm_settings WHERE equipment_code = #{equipmentCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE alarm_settings SET minThreshold = #{minThreshold}, maxThreshold = #{maxThreshold}, description = #{description}, enabled = #{enabled} WHERE id = #{id}
